DOC.brief_summary: This is an open label, single-center study to determine the absolute bioavailability and nasopharyngeal absorption of PMI-150 (intranasal ketamine) 30 mg in healthy adult volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Absolute Bioavailability and Nasopharyngeal Absorption of Intranasal Ketamine
DOC.detailed_description: To examine the safety and assess the absolute bioavailability and nasopharyngeal absorption of PMI-150 30mg.
